sourcesContent:
Choose Your Domain

Angular Quiz
Rules:
  1. Correct answer of each question will give you 1 point.
  2. Incorrect answer of each question will give you -1 point.
  3. You will get 60 seconds to answer each and every question.
  4. Refreshing the page will reset the Quiz.

All the best!!
